content: Goodbye The Personal Power Influencer School, hello The Clown School! #newpurpose #whatyouareseeingisreal #thisisnotanillusion The Clown School | Break all the rules - be a clown.There are three stages to the core training at The Clown School-Level 1: What Kind of Fool Am I?, Level 2: Tricks …www.theclownschool.com Awesome post, Andrei. Thank you.
